page.title: 17A Small Engineering Works
page.content: We looked at local industry in our area.To do this we visited a small engineering works. Firstly we looked at the Hydrostatic Release units these are used for safety on yachts & ships,this is there main product. In 1985 their main product was 50% subcontract. They have a small wealding department with four wealding machines. They also have a small painting department which caters for all their uses. One of their specialities is moulding plastic. It goes into one end as plastic chips, it gets melted down and gets put into a mould.They have around 40 people work there and 50% live in our survey area. They have one computerised machine and one automatic machine.
